subject: Re: Website change " I am a patient of Total Eyecare"
preview: Hi Lee,  I hope all is well,  Sure, we have increased it's size and yes, it is all live.

full_threads.body:
Hi Lee,

I hope all is well,

Sure, we have increased it's size and yes, it is all live.

Thanks Joel
Is it possible to make the error message more prominent?
I can email affected customers now, its all live?
Lee:)
Logged 1.5H to Harvest
@rica (Time: 90mins)

Hi Lee,

We have updated the live site. Here's how it looks like (We test it on the staging first).
if "Already a Patient" exists in the order
  • The reorder button is removed and disclaimer text will show up.

If "Already a Patient" doesn't exist in the order
  • Nothing has change and the reorder button will show up.

Hi Lee,

The list are on customer role in the backend.

We are looking into this, we will try this one on staging first as this would need to custom coded. We will update you by the end of the week.

Yes, thats it. I use that list...thats the subscribed ones?

Sorry for the confusion

Also tho, we have realised that pts clicking "reorder" that function is still valid (we got one today). Is there a way or removing that functionality? It might need a message to come up (sorry, in order to reorder this time you need to enter your contact lens prescription. Please contact customer support on .... If you need any assistance

Could that work?
Lee:)

Hi Lee,

Sure, Can you send a screenshot of what you are seeing?
Please see the attached.

Hi Joel,
Sorry I was referring to the spreadsheet you sent me. Im trying to capture all customers who have ordered as "I am a patient of Total Eyecare" and are registered subscribers. I wasnt understanding which list to use on the 2 separate pages of the spreadsheet
Thanks
Lee

Hi Lee,

We are looking into this, Can you send us a screenshot or the link you are seeing?

Hi Joel,
Sorry what is the difference between "all emails" and "customer emails"? Customer is "am a pt of total eyecare" AND subscriber?

Thanks
Lee
Great, thanks Joel:)

Hi Lee,

Sure, it seems that some products has a different field names, I have hidden the other items as well. Can you try now?

Hi Joel,
Actually, its still showing when i check it now

Lee:)
Thanks Joel!
Logged 30mins to Harvest
@rica (Time: 30mins)

Hi Lee,

We have hidden the "I am a patient of Total Eyecare optometrists, you have my prescription". Let me know if this works for you?

Already a patient
